>Is the spec for how beans are stored in the session "published"?  If so,
>where....
Hi,

it's just a request.setAttribute() or session.setAttribute or 
application.setAttribute() that is used to store a bean in the 
request/session/application scope. The JSP spec is not obvious about this 
fact, but I think it's just a lack of clarity : if you read between  the 
lines of the spec, you should see the light ;)

Just look at the servlet generated (.java) from your JSP with a useBean tag 
and you will see how simple really it is.

mathieu
